tool.name: OGS: ResetPropertiesInPolygonalRegion
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'ResetPropertiesInPolygonalRegion'.
tool.command: ResetPropertiesInPolygonalRegion #if str($polygon_name): --polygon-name '$polygon_name' #end if #for $f in $geometry: --geometry '$f' #end for $any_of --char-property-value '$char_property_value' --int-property-value '$int_property_value' --property-name '$property_name' --restrict-to-MaterialID '$restrict_to_MaterialID' #for $f in $mesh_input_file: --mesh-input-file '$f' #end for #for $f in $gmsh_path: --gmsh-path '$f' #end for --mesh-output-file output_1.dat

param.name: polygon_name
param.label: polygon name
param.help: name of polygon in the geometry

param.name: geometry
param.label: geometry
param.help: the name of the file containing the input geometry

param.name: any_of
param.label: any of
param.help: all nodes of an element has to be inside the polygon (default

param.name: property_name
param.label: property name
param.help: name of property in the mesh

param.name: restrict_to_MaterialID
param.label: restrict to MaterialID
param.help: Restrict resetting the property to the material id

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: the name of the file containing the input mesh,

param.name: gmsh_path
param.label: gmsh path
param.help: the path to the input binary

tool.help: This tool runs the **ResetPropertiesInPolygonalRegion** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
